title: Lime meringue tart
ingredients: ['240ml full fat milk', '65g caster sugar', '60ml lime juice, strained before measuring', '2 medium egg yolks', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '275g lime curd (recipe follows)', '1 (25cm) baked tart case', 'Meringue', '4 medium egg whites', '150g caster sugar', 'Lime curd', '120g unsalted butter', '5 medium egg yolks', '200g caster sugar', '75ml lime juice, strained before measuring', '2 teaspoons lime zest']
